introduction: A comprehensive picture of the faith of mankind – this series features the origins and impact of 5 world religions and explores their traditions and the challenges of today.The 5-part documentary series tells the fascinating story of the most important spiritual revolutions in world history that have been of central influence to humanity ever since. Prejudice and false shame may not allow people to inform themselves outside their own religion, but this series offers a remedy. Each episode focuses on the history of one of the five world religions. The series discovers how each respective religion came into being and how they shaped society, and what influence historical events had on the religion itself and its traditions. The series explains in detail what the followers of each religion believe and how they are practiced in the present.E1 ChristianityE2 IslamE3 JudaismE4 HinduismE5 BuddhismProduced by Go Button Media with AutenticPartners Curiosity Stream, ntv
